meta.hint:
Use 'has' if the sentence is about one person, animal, place, or, thing.
example Brian has a little brother.
example She has two ice-creams.
Use have if the sentence is about more than one person, animal, place or
thing. Also, use 'have' if the sentence is about you or I.
example The girls have many friends.
example You have a pretty dress.
example I have a dog.
meta.question: Complete the sentence with has or have.
